document.full_text: foreign troops killed two afghan civilians in restive southern kandahar city on thursday, a police detective said, days after the publication of gruesome photos of the body of an unarmed teenager murdered by u.s. soldiers nearby.
document.title: foreign troops kill afghan civilians in kandahar: police
lines_and_colors: foreign troops killed two afghan civilians in restive southern kandahar city on thursday, a police detective said, days after the publication of gruesome photos of the body of an unarmed teenager murdered by u.s. soldiers nearby.
